# pihole_dns_blocking (Resource)

Manages the Pi-hole DNS blocking status.

This resource controls whether Pi-hole is actively blocking DNS queries.

## Example Usage

### Enable Blocking

```hcl
resource "pihole_dns_blocking" "main" {
  enabled = true
}
```

### Temporarily Disable Blocking

```hcl
resource "pihole_dns_blocking" "main" {
  enabled = false
  timer   = 300  # Auto-enable after 5 minutes
}
```

~> **Note:** This resource is a singleton - only one instance should exist per Pi-hole.
The resource ID is always "blocking".

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Enable DNS blocking (default state)
resource "pihole_dns_blocking" "main" {
  enabled = true
}

# Temporarily disable DNS blocking for 5 minutes
resource "pihole_dns_blocking" "temporary_disable" {
  enabled = false
  timer   = 300 # seconds
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether DNS blocking is enabled.

### Optional

- `timer` (Number) Seconds until the blocking status automatically toggles. Null for permanent state.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the resource.
